import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
a = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().strip().split()]

max_rest = 0
current_rest = 0
for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 1:
        current_rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, current_rest)
        current_rest = 0
max_rest = max(max_rest, current_rest)

print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

max_rest = 0
current_rest = 0

for i in a:
    if i == 0:
        current_rest += 1
    else:
        max_rest = max(max_rest, current_rest)
        current_rest = 0

max_rest = max(max_rest, current_rest)
print(max_rest)

n = int(input())
a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]

max_length = 0
length = 0

for i in range(n):
    if a[i] == 0:
        length += 1
    else:
        max_length = max(max_length, length)
        length = 0

max_length = max(max_length, length)

print(max_length)
